ygData.subject: RE: Re: Re: BARD HATE
ygData.msgSnippet: [snip] ... Well.. again I can only comment based on personal experience, and this has never happened to me.  The only alternative is that it s hard coded into
ygData.messageBody:
[snip]

> But what explains this?
> Sitting in Crushbone, not singing, not fighting, just
> watching, "An orc
> oracle begins to cast a spell. You feel drowsy."
> In the middle of combat with a whole other party! That's Bard Hate.
>
> Talies

Well.. again I can only comment based on personal experience, and this has
never happened to me. The only alternative is that it's hard coded into the
program, which I find completely illogical - and again, if that's the case
it would have happened to me by now (one would think). Please don't think
that this means I'm implying that what you're saying isn't true... I
wouldn't dare! :)

With that being said, I remove myself from this discussion - which as far as
I can tell has no resulotion in sight.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
